soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month

classification.rationale: The role focuses on improving AI systems, fine-tuning models, and integrating AI capabilities into customer support, which aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While not explicitly mentioning advanced frameworks, the emphasis on improving AI performance through feedback and fine-tuning strongly points to this profile.
